code:
Drive Description

How You'll Help Us Connect the World

As Ruckus Networks (CommScope) designs and builds connectivity for the world’s most advanced networks, we’re building something equally as important: careers for forward-thinking college students like you. Our New College Graduates / Internship Program is designed to provide you an invaluable work experience through completing meaningful projects to help you grow and develop.

Throughout the program, you will collaborate with some of the best in the industry, receive on-the-job training, and participate in professional development workshops, executive speaker series, and other networking and social events!

We are looking for forward-thinking talent who can contribute towards the success of organization. We have roles which can shape your career into entire software life cycle which consists of Development and Testing in various product lines like Access Points, Small Cell, ICX, Cloud/On-Prem Controller, Analytics and DevOps.

Hence, we prefer Candidates who are open for challenges.

Required qualifications:
Strong fundamentals in Computer Science or Information science engineering.
Thorough understanding of data structures, and real time embedded systems
Good knowledge in fundamentals like OSI layers, TCP/IP protocols and socket programming, Cloud technologies
Good Knowledge in Linux kernel, Networking, protocols, packet routing, bridging and data plane services.
Good programming knowledge in C/C++ and/or Scripting languages like JavaScript, jQuery, Python, Perl
DevOps, CI/CD, knowledge of various tools, open-source technologies, and cloud services

You will excite us if you have
Excellent Analytical, problem solving and logical reasoning skills
Good Written & verbal communication skills
Good understanding of L2/L3 networking

Selection Process:
Online assessment on HackerEarth
Face-to-face interviews at their Bangalore office
